column2: "Oh, <%me>. No, I will refer to you as Guardian, as Lady Harriet and the others do."
"Once again, my name is Alisa. I was chosen as this generation's Sword Maiden."
"I feel truly honored to be meeting a figure of legend."
"But Alisa, aren't you a figure of legend as well?"
"This is merely a tradition here. For generations, only the chosen Sword Maidens are allowed to inherit the Hero's Sword and Strength."
"Could you use it to save the world?"
"I'm not sure. Until now, I'd never thought of it as anything like power."
"My strength only exists to serve one purpose."
"It's not as you may think. My strength serves a singular purpose."
"My strength is the key to defeating the Crimson Evil Dragon that will one day resurrect itself."
"The sword and strength that I inherited will only reveal their true power when facing the Crimson Evil Dragon. That is the legend I follow."
"It's more or less an old wives' tale that has been passed down through generations. However, I cannot downplay the importance of it, nor can I reject its significance..."
"Even if the nation begins to collapse or my family begin to fall, one after another... I am forbidden from using my strength."
"It is. However, it's my duty... I am the last bastion of defense against the Crimson Evil Dragon, who will eventually resurrect itself."
"I have felt pain and suffering before, but I never disliked what I've inherited."
"People from legends are like that. Isn't that right, Guardian?"
